name: Flopy
description:
Flopy is a young disk who has been given a vital task. Join him in his quest, avoid USB sticks, and make it to the end, do not run out of space!

How to play

WASD move

SPACE jump

E interact

You have to collect 5 folders to advance to the next level. There will be 7 folders, 2 of which are hidden in the level!

Full gameplay with all the secrets
